start_game:
/sapper - start the game
/language - select a language
send_all_start: Send all the message on start bot
bot_started_press_sapper: Bot is running F973, write /sapper to start the game
you_lost:
You lose
write /sapper for a new game
you_win: You won hit /sapper to start a new game
bot_started_admin_mode_off: the Bot is running, the mode of administration off
